name: coursier
description: Directly launch, or install to the local tool cache and make available for use in subsequent steps, a specified application using Coursier.
helpMarkDown: Directly launch, or install to the local tool cache and make available for use in subsequent steps, a specified application using [Coursier](https://get-coursier.io).
author: Duchessa Team

inputs.name: app
inputs.label: Application Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the application to be installed to the local tool cache, or launched. _Note: Application must be available in enabled [channels](https://get-coursier.io/docs/cli-install.html#channels)_.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Application Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of the application to be installed to the local tool cache, or launched. _Note: Application must be available in enabled Coursier [channels](https://get-coursier.io/docs/cli-install.html#channels).

inputs.name: repositories
inputs.label: Repositories
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma or space separated list of additional repositories used for dependency resolution.

inputs.name: channel
inputs.label: Application Channel
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies an alternate Coursier [channel](https://get-coursier.io/docs/cli-install.html#channels) for application resolution.

inputs.name: defaultChannels
inputs.label: Use Default Channels
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies whether Coursier default application channels are used.

inputs.name: contribChannel
inputs.label: Use Contrib Channel
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies whether Coursier `contrib` application channel is used.

inputs.name: coursierVersion
inputs.label: Coursier Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version number of [Coursier](https://get-coursier.io) to be installed and/or executed.

inputs.name: cs
inputs.label: Use cs
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether the [Coursier](https://get-coursier.io) _cs_ cli launcher is resolved and used instead of the Java jar based _coursier_ launcher.

inputs.name: launcherType
inputs.label: Application Launcher Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Style of application launcher to be generated by Coursier. Supported options are [`standalone`](https://get-coursier.io/docs/cli-bootstrap.html#standalone-bootstraps) or [`assembly`](https://get-coursier.io/docs/cli-bootstrap.html#assemblies).

inputs.name: launchArgs
inputs.label: Application Launch Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Arguments to be passed on to application during launch.
